name: Les Kassos Du Grenier
description:
Welcome to Les Kassos du Grenier, an Action/Party game.

With 3 friends, you will do a intensive battle to be the king of the attic! AN EPIC FIGHT IS COMMING SIR.

In this 2vs2, each membre of a team have a specific role: 

- Runner, you have to catch the ennemis treasure,

- Sniper, you have to shoot the ennemis runner to stop him.

At the end of the timer, the team who have the higher score win.

YOU CAN'T LOOSE, YOUR HONOR IS ENGAGE. BE BRAVE, STAY STRONG, AND ENJOY.

Les Kassos du Grenier's Team hope you have some good time.

Uxross: Here,

Angelo:  Here,

Lictaw, 

Marvin.
